name: rrx2pxel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mapfvd(c0, nat1, cr, c1, c2, wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: mapfvd(c0, nat1, cr, c1, c2, c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(nat1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(nat1, c2))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(nat1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(nat1, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, c2)

body.origin:
|- wcel(nat1, c2)
-| wcel(nat1, cpr(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c2, cpr(nat1, nat2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cpr(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c2, cpr(nat1, nat2))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cpr(nat1, nat2))
-| wcel(nat1, universe)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat1), cr))
-| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cpr(nat1, nat2))

comment: The x-coordinate of a point in a real Euclidean space of dimension 2 is a real number. (Contributed by AV, 2-Feb-2023.)
